mapper.select: select * from h_score_record where scorerecordzzid > #{start} order by scorerecordzzid limit 10000
mapper.update: delete from h_score_record where scorerecordzzid in (#{item.scorerecordzzid})

mapper.update: delete from h_recycle_record where recyclerecordzzid in (#{item.recyclerecordzzid})

mapper.update: delete from h_recycle_loseweight where recycleloseweightzzid in (#{item.recycleloseweightzzid})
